description: UK Foreign Secretary William Hague has visited Tunisia as part of a tour of North African and Middle Eastern states affected by calls for political change.

title: 'Intense violence' in Libyan city

description: Forces loyal to the former President Laurent Gbagbo have clashed with supporters of Alassane Ouattara, who is internationally recognised as having won November's election.

description: As forces loyal to Colonel Gaddafi clash with rebels, the world is faced with a dilemma as to whether foreign armies should get embroiled.
